short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that analyzes highlighted text and provides an ABT score as developed by Dr Randy Olson

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension analyzes highlighted text for the ratio of occurrences of the word "but" vs the word "and". According to Dr. Randy Olson of scienceneedsstory.com, the higher the ratio, the higher quality the narrative structure of the text. 
To use this extension, simply highlight the text you wish to analyze, and run the extension. A score of 14% or better indicates a high quality narrative. 

Produced by John Rael of skepticallypwnd.com
Developed by Emily Wright

Update  6/3/2023 v 1.1 adds instructions in the popup window.
Update 6/14/2023  1.1.1 fixes case sensitivity bug
